bs-bookshelf-ve-booklist-attr-filter-hel: metadata a sɔn so sei: value, e.g. title:handbook
bs-bookshelf-ve-bookmeta-attr-author-hel: Kyere onipa a ɔtwereɛ nwoma no
bs-bookshelf-tag-bookshelf-box-desc: Fa nwoma no ti no hyehyɛ krataafa a ɛnka nwoma no ho.Nnumre noara bɛ  hyehyɛ ne ho sɛ nea nsɛmfua no pono no teɛ.
bs-bookshelf-ve-bookshelf-attr-book-help: Kyerɛ nwoma korɔ a krataafa yi yɛ no dea anaa ɛfiri mu
bs-bookshelf-pref-prepend-tocnumber-help: Fa nwoma no ti hyɛ bia emu nsɛm no wɔ ne nsemti a ɛwɔ kratafa no mu
